sources.title: (Spencer Tracy, Joan Bennett) Father's Little Dividend 1951 | Comedy, Drama, Romance | 4k Full Movie
sources.description:
Shortly after coming to terms with his daughter's marriage, a father faces the prospect of becoming a grandfather.

Original title: Father's Little Dividend (1951)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/86ELIeyTBmU

This film is available with French, German, Italian & Spanish dubbed audio. 
Go to settings ⚙️ to modify your audio / subtitle language options

Director: Vincente Minnelli
Writers: Albert Hackett, Frances Goodrich
Stars: Spencer Tracy, Joan Bennett, Elizabeth Taylor 
Genres: Colorized classics, Comedy, Drama, Romance
Budget: $941,000 (estimated)

00:00 Full Movie
02:08  A man comes home feeling optimistic about life, but his wife reveals they have received good news about a business deal instead of expecting a baby.
08:19  Stanley Banks is shocked to learn that his daughter is pregnant and he will become a grandfather.
16:05  Ellie suggests that Kay and Buckley move in with them to help take care of the baby.
21:07  A couple discusses their new house and preparations for their baby's arrival.
26:27  A family discusses possible names for their upcoming baby, causing tension and arguments.
32:33  A couple discusses their concerns about a new approach to childbirth with a doctor, but their daughter goes missing.
39:28  A couple has a heated argument and the wife leaves, causing the husband to call the police and search for her.
51:31  A couple anxiously prepares for the birth of their baby and rushes to the hospital.
58:23  A grandfather struggles to bond with his grandson but eventually learns to accept and love him.
1:17:04  A baby is lost in the park and the grandfather frantically searches for him.
1:19:21  The video captures the christening of the narrator's grandchild and his feelings towards becoming a grandfather.
